title: Sighting Crescent Moon Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Sighting Crescent Moon Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Sighting Crescent Moon Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 175
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللَّهُمَّ أَهِلَّهُ عَلَيْنَا بِالْأَمْنِ وَالْإِيمَانِ، وَالسَّلاَمَةِ وَالْإِسْلاَمِ، وَالتَّوْفِيقِ لِمَا تُحِبُّ رَبَّنَا وَتَرْضَى، رَبُّنَا وَرَبُّكَ اللَّهُ)).
items.transliteration: Allahu akbar, allahumma ahillahu AAalayna bil-amni wal-eeman, wassalamati wal-islam, wattawfeeiqi lima tuhibbu watarda, rabbuna warabbukal-lah.
items.translation: Allah is the greatest. O Allah, let the crescent loom above us in safety, faith, peace, and Islam, and in agreement with all that You love and pleases You. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء الهلال
